definition: to pick out/to select and recruit/to pluck/to pull
to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

sentences.english: It uses the methods in physics, electrical transfixion double-sided circuit connection.
sentences.chinese: 它拔取物理的办法，融会双面的导电线路拆开。

sentences.english: So drug eluting stent may be the optimal choice for CMB patients.
sentences.chinese: 因此利用药物支架可能是志向的拔取。

sentences.english: So we should choose some good programs to watch, especially for children.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们应该拔取一些好节目来看，出格是对孩子们。

sentences.english: This truck is a wonderful transport vehicle of roarticle goods and line-haul.
sentences.chinese: 该系列车型是公路货物长途运输的统统拔取工具。

sentences.english: Of the three of us only one gets to go for the contest in the end.
sentences.chinese: 我们最终只能这三个人当中拔取一名参加比赛。

definition: short slender pointed piece of metal, bamboo etc/skewer/prod used to extract samples from sacks of grain etc/(dialect) to stick in/to bolt (a door)/to arrange (flowers in a vase)/to graft (tree)/to pedicure/to peel (an apple etc)
